entry.translation: Seete-a Cuntect Edmeenistreshun
Mudeeffy Seete-a Cuntect Cunffeegooreshun
Shurt URLS fur furooms. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Support Short URLSs [DO NOT USE - NOT WORKING]
entry.translation: Sooppurt Shurt URLSs [DO NOT USE - NOT VORKING]

entry.string: Custom title for your contact page.
entry.translation: Coostum teetle-a fur yuoor cuntect pege-a.
Coostum pege-a teetle

entry.string: Custom text for the contact page. You can use HTML here if configured on your site.
entry.translation: Coostum text fur zee cuntect pege-a. Yuoo cun use-a HTML here-a iff cunffeegoored oon yuoor seete-a.
Yuoor coostum text. Um de hur de hur de hur. :

entry.string: Custom text displayed on your site after the user sends their message.
entry.translation: Coostum text deespleyed oon yuoor seete-a effter zee user sends zeeur messege-a.
Cunffurm Pege-a Text:

entry.string: Subject and optional email address per line. Form : Subject[semicolon]email[comma]
entry.translation: Soobject und oopshunel imeeel eddress per leene-a. Furm : Soobject[semeeculun]imeeel[cumma]

entry.string: Options for subject with optional alternative email address.
entry.translation: Opshuns fur soobject veet oopshunel elterneteefe-a imeeel eddress. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Each line above should be entered with the semicolon and comma:
entry.translation: Eech leene-a ebufe-a shuoold be-a intered veet zee semeeculun und cumma:
soobject;oopshunel-imeeel,

entry.string: The optional email and semicolon can be omitted but must have comma to separate each line.
entry.translation: Zee oopshunel imeeel und semeeculun cun be-a oomeetted boot moost hefe-a cumma tu seperete-a iech leene-a.

entry.string: Included in email to user - use HTML only if email configured for HTML
entry.translation: Inclooded in imeeel tu user - use-a HTML oonly iff imeeel cunffeegoored fur HTML
Emeeeled nute-a tu user:

entry.string: You can use the following variables in your email:
entry.translation: Yuoo cun use-a zee fullooeeng fereeebles in yuoor imeeel:
User imeeel
User neme
Soobject frum drup doon leest
Updete-a Cunffeegooreshun
